text: Va ammo on devor ʙaroi ʙa du pisarʙacai jatim dar on sahr ʙud va zeri on gance ʙud, ki ʙa on du taalluq dost va padarason [niz] marde durustkor ʙud; pas, Parvardigorat xost, ki onon ʙa haddi ʙuluƣ ʙirasand va ganci xesro [az zeri on devor] ʙerun ovarand. In rahmate az coniʙi Parvardigori tu ʙud va man in [korho]-ro xudsarona nakardam, in ʙud tavzeh [va daleli] korhoe, ki natavonisti dar ʙaroʙaras sikeʙoi kuni»
